messages.title: Let's Unleash Britain's Potential
messages.content: Let's get Brexit done. Let's get on with the country's priorities. LET'S UNLEASH BRITAIN'S POTENTIAL.

messages.title: Our Economy Can't Afford More Uncertainty with a Hung Parliament
messages.content: Labour won't win a majority. But Jeremy Corbyn could still become Prime Minister. Propped up by smaller parties like Nicola Sturgeon's SNP. That means more uncertainty for our economy. With no end to the Brexit arguments. And another Scottish independence referendum. That's not all. Corbyn's plans for our economy would undo the progress of the last few years. The head of the CBI, our business group's said that Corbyn's plans would 'crack the foundations of our economy.' With massive taxes on businesses - which will stop investment and cost jobs. And with £1.2 trillion of extra spending - which will send our public finances back into chaos. Don't let Labour take us back to square one. Vote Conservative on December 12th to get Brexit done and secure the majority government this country needs.

More funding for every pupil in every school
£3.6 billion to help towns invest and attract new businesses
